title: Mobility Semi Live Processing Dataset
description: Semantic model for a mobility dataset used for semi live processing of transportation mode inference using DBSCAN and rule-based approach.

domain.description: The context or application domain of the dataset.

intent.description: The purpose or intended use of the dataset processing.

algorithm.description: The algorithm or approach used for inference.

model.description: A configuration name representing trigger parameters.

trigger_type.description: The type of trigger used to initiate processing (e.g., points, time_window, stationary, safety_net).

trigger_points.description: Number of data points required to trigger a segment.

trigger_time_window.description: Time window duration (in seconds) to trigger a segment.

trigger_safety_net_hours.description: Time (in hours) for safety net threshold.

accuracy.description: Overall accuracy percentage of the inference process.

segment_count_diff.description: Difference in segment counts between inferred and ground truth.

mode_label_similarity.description: Similarity measure between inferred and actual mode labels.

structural_similarity_score.description: Structural similarity score indicating shape similarity between segments.

runtime_per_user_day_sec.description: Runtime consumed per user per day in seconds.
